languages.text: "Будь Фиделио здесь, знай он о своем статусе наследника — уже объявился бы. И если это не вы, {mf|господин|госпожа}, то, видно, правды мы никогда не узнаем. Но можем ее выдумать, почему нет? Мы на Футфоле, здесь именами и идеями торгуют и вертят, как хотят. А раз так, остается признать, что Фиделио — это вы".

traits.locale_text: "Будь Фиделио здесь, знай он о своем статусе наследника — уже объявился бы. И если это не вы, {mf|господин|госпожа}, то, видно, правды мы никогда не узнаем. Но можем ее выдумать, почему нет? Мы на Футфоле, здесь именами и идеями торгуют и вертят, как хотят. А раз так, остается признать, что Фиделио — это вы".

languages.text: "If Fidelio were here, if they were to know about their status as the heir — they would have made themselves known by now. And if it's not you, {mf|sir|ma'am}, then I suppose we'll never know the truth. But we can make our own truth, can't we? We're on Footfall, names and ideas are traded and used here in every way imaginable. And so all that remains is to recognise you as Fidelio."
languages.original_text: "Будь Фиделио здесь, знай он о своем статусе наследника — уже объявился бы. И если это не вы, {mf|господин|госпожа}, то, видно, правды мы никогда не узнаем. Но можем ее выдумать, почему нет? Мы на Футфоле, здесь именами и идеями торгуют и вертят, как хотят. А раз так, остается признать, что Фиделио — это вы".

traits.locale_text: "If Fidelio were here, if they were to know about their status as the heir — they would've appeared by now. And if it's not you, {mf|sir|madam}, then I suppose we'll never know the truth. But we can make one up, why not? We're on Footfall, names and ideas are traded and used here in every way imaginable. And therefore all we can do is acknowledge that you are Fidelio."

"If Fidelio were here, if they were to know about their status as the heir — they would've appeared by now. And if it's not you, {mf|sir|madam}, then I suppose we'll never know the truth. But we can make one up, why not? We're on Footfall, names and ideas are traded and used here in every way imaginable. And therefore all we can do is acknowledge that you are Fidelio."

"If Fidelio were here, if they were to know about their status as the heir — they would have made themselves known by now. And if it's not you, {mf|sir|ma'am}, then I suppose we'll never know the truth. But we can make our own truth, can't we? We're on Footfall, names and ideas are traded and used here in every way imaginable. And so all that remains is to recognize you as Fidelio."

"If Fidelio were here, if they were to know about their status as the heir — they would have made themselves known by now. And if it's not you, {mf|sir|ma'am}, then I suppose we'll never know the truth. But we can make our own truth, can't we? We're on Footfall, names and ideas are traded and used here in every way imaginable. And so all that remains is to recognize you as Fidelio."

"If Fidelio were here, if they were to know about their status as the heir — they would have made themselves known by now. And if it's not you, {mf|sir|ma'am}, then I suppose we'll never know the truth. But we can make our own truth, can't we? We're on Footfall, names and ideas are traded and used here in every way imaginable. And so all that remains is to recognise you as Fidelio."

languages.text: “如果菲迪奥在这里，如果那个人知道自己是遗产的继承人，那个人恐怕早就已经公开身份了。如果你并不是菲迪奥，{mf|先生|女士}，那恐怕我们永远都无法得知真相了。不过，我们可以创造属于我们自己的真相，不是吗？我们这是在落脚港，所有的名字与想法，都可以按照我们愿意的方式进行交易、使用。既然如此，接下来要做的事情，就是认定你就是菲迪奥。”
languages.original_text: "If Fidelio were here, if they were to know about their status as the heir — they would have made themselves known by now. And if it's not you, {mf|sir|ma'am}, then I suppose we'll never know the truth. But we can make our own truth, can't we? We're on Footfall, names and ideas are traded and used here in every way imaginable. And so all that remains is to recognise you as Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: “如果菲迪奥在这里，如果那个人知道自己是遗产的继承人，那个人恐怕早就已经公开身份了。如果你并不是菲迪奥，{mf|先生|女士}，那恐怕我们永远都无法得知真相了。不过，我们可以创造属于我们自己的真相，不是吗？我们这是在落脚港，所有的名字与想法，都可以按照我们愿意的方式进行交易、使用。既然如此，接下来要做的事情，就是认定你就是菲迪奥。”

languages.text: «Si Fidelio estuviera aquí y supiera de su estatus, ya se habría dado a conocer. Y si no es usted, señor{mf||a}, entonces supongo que nunca llegaremos a saber quién es. Pero podemos crear nuestra propia verdad, ¿no? Estamos en Paso, donde los nombres e ideas se compran y se usan para cualquier cosa. Por eso, solo queda reconocerle como Fidelio».
languages.original_text: "If Fidelio were here, if they were to know about their status as the heir — they would have made themselves known by now. And if it's not you, {mf|sir|ma'am}, then I suppose we'll never know the truth. But we can make our own truth, can't we? We're on Footfall, names and ideas are traded and used here in every way imaginable. And so all that remains is to recognise you as Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: «Si Fidelio estuviera aquí y supiera de su estatus, ya se habría dado a conocer. Y si no es usted, señor{mf||a}, entonces supongo que nunca llegaremos a saber quién es. Pero podemos crear nuestra propia verdad, ¿no? Estamos en Paso, donde los nombres e ideas se compran y se usan para cualquier cosa. Por eso, solo queda reconocerle como Fidelio».

languages.text: 「もしフィデリオがこの場にいて、自分が相続人であると知っていれば、とっくに身分を公表しているはず。それがあなたでないと言うなら、我々は一生真実を知ることはないでしょう。しかし、自分たちで『真実』を作ることはできます。ここはフットフォール…名前もアイデアも、あらゆる方法で取引される場所です。だから、後はあなた自身がフィデリオであると名乗ればいいのです」
languages.original_text: "If Fidelio were here, if they were to know about their status as the heir — they would have made themselves known by now. And if it's not you, {mf|sir|ma'am}, then I suppose we'll never know the truth. But we can make our own truth, can't we? We're on Footfall, names and ideas are traded and used here in every way imaginable. And so all that remains is to recognise you as Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: 「もしフィデリオがこの場にいて、自分が相続人であると知っていれば、とっくに身分を公表しているはず。それがあなたでないと言うなら、我々は一生真実を知ることはないでしょう。しかし、自分たちで『真実』を作ることはできます。ここはフットフォール…名前もアイデアも、あらゆる方法で取引される場所です。だから、後はあなた自身がフィデリオであると名乗ればいいのです」

languages.text: "Wenn Fidelio hier wäre und von seinem Status als Erbe wüsste, hätte er sich mittlerweile zu erkennen gegeben. Und wenn Ihr es nicht seid, {mf|Herr|Herrin}, dann werden wir die Wahrheit wohl nie erfahren. Aber wir können uns unsere eigene Wahrheit schaffen, oder nicht? Wir sind auf Footfall, und hier werden Namen und Ideen auf jede erdenkliche Art gehandelt und benutzt. Wir müssen also lediglich Euch als Fidelio anerkennen."
languages.original_text: "If Fidelio were here, if they were to know about their status as the heir — they would have made themselves known by now. And if it's not you, {mf|sir|ma'am}, then I suppose we'll never know the truth. But we can make our own truth, can't we? We're on Footfall, names and ideas are traded and used here in every way imaginable. And so all that remains is to recognise you as Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Fidelio hier wäre und von seinem Status als Erbe wüsste, hätte er sich mittlerweile zu erkennen gegeben. Und wenn Ihr es nicht seid, {mf|Herr|Herrin}, dann werden wir die Wahrheit wohl nie erfahren. Aber wir können uns unsere eigene Wahrheit schaffen, oder nicht? Wir sind auf Footfall, und hier werden Namen und Ideen auf jede erdenkliche Art gehandelt und benutzt. Wir müssen also lediglich Euch als Fidelio anerkennen."

languages.text: « Si Fidélio était ici et connaissait son statut d'héritier, il – ou elle – se serait manifesté depuis longtemps. Et si ce n'est pas vous, {mf|monsieur|madame}, alors j'imagine que nous ne connaîtrons jamais la vérité. Mais la vérité n'est-elle pas ce que l'on décide d'en faire ? Nous sommes à Castel, après tout. Ici, les noms et les idéaux se troquent de toutes les manières possibles et imaginables. Donc tout ce qu'il nous reste à faire, c'est de vous désigner comme Fidélio. »
languages.original_text: "If Fidelio were here, if they were to know about their status as the heir — they would have made themselves known by now. And if it's not you, {mf|sir|ma'am}, then I suppose we'll never know the truth. But we can make our own truth, can't we? We're on Footfall, names and ideas are traded and used here in every way imaginable. And so all that remains is to recognise you as Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: « Si Fidélio était ici et connaissait son statut d'héritier, il – ou elle – se serait manifesté depuis longtemps. Et si ce n'est pas vous, {mf|monsieur|madame}, alors j'imagine que nous ne connaîtrons jamais la vérité. Mais la vérité n'est-elle pas ce que l'on décide d'en faire ? Nous sommes à Castel, après tout. Ici, les noms et les idéaux se troquent de toutes les manières possibles et imaginables. Donc tout ce qu'il nous reste à faire, c'est de vous désigner comme Fidélio. »

languages.text: "Fidelio burada olsaydı ve kendisinin vâris olduğunu bilseydi şimdiye dek ortaya çıkardı. Siz değilseniz de {mf|beyefendi|hanımefendi}, gerçeği asla öğrenemeyeceğiz demektir. Fakat kendi hakikatimizi kendimiz yazabiliriz, değil mi? Burası Binliman. İsimler ve fikirler burada akla gelebilecek her türlü şekilde takas edilip kullanılır. Dolayısıyla tek yapacağımız, sizi Fidelio olarak tanımak olacak."
languages.original_text: "If Fidelio were here, if they were to know about their status as the heir — they would have made themselves known by now. And if it's not you, {mf|sir|ma'am}, then I suppose we'll never know the truth. But we can make our own truth, can't we? We're on Footfall, names and ideas are traded and used here in every way imaginable. And so all that remains is to recognise you as Fidelio."

traits.locale_text: "Fidelio burada olsaydı ve kendisinin vâris olduğunu bilseydi şimdiye kadar ortaya çıkardı. O kişi siz değilseniz {mf|beyefendi|hanımefendi}, gerçeği asla öğrenemeyeceğiz demektir. Fakat kendi gerçeğimizi kendimiz yazabiliriz, değil mi? Burası Binliman. İsimler ve fikirler burada türlü şekilde takas edilip kullanılır. O zaman geriye kalan tek seçenek, sizi Fidelio olarak tanımak."
